titles.title: Renewable Fuels Promotion Act
A bill to amend the Petroleum Marketing Practices Act to prohibit restrictions on the installation of renewable fuel pumps, and for other purposes.
Renewable Fuels Promotion Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Renewable Fuels Promotion Act - Amends the Petroleum Marketing Practices Act to prohibit a franchisor from restricting a franchisee from installing a renewable fuel pump on the franchisee marketing premises.
Deems such restriction to be null and void and unenforceable under the Act.
Amends the Energy Policy Act of 1992 to set a deadline for mandatory installation of at least one renewable fuel pump at every federal fleet fueling center in the United States.
